thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Auditors PwC looking to complete Steinhoff probe by end 2018

title: Auditors PwC looking to complete Steinhoff probe by end 2018
text:
March 28, 2018 / 9:41 AM / Updated an hour ago Auditors PwC looking to complete Steinhoff probe by end 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
CAPE TOWN, March 28 (Reuters) - Auditors PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) said they would like to finalise a complex forensic investigation into the affairs of Steinhoff International by year-end, a senior investigator at the firm told parliament on Wednesday. 
Steinhoff, which has more than 40 retail brands that include Conforama and Poundland, is in a fight for survival after admitting “accounting irregularities” in December, wiping about 85 percent off its market value and triggering a liquidity crisis. (Reporting by Wendell Roelf Editing by James Macharia)
